com.service.kerberos.rest.client

Interface IKerberosKeyServerClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KerberosKeyServerClientImpl

    public interface IKerberosKeyServerClient
    This interface provides the functionality to securely connect with Key Server to get Secret Keys
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.crypto.SecretKey getKeyFromKeyServer(ServiceTicket serviceTicket, KerberosAuthenticationAPIImpl.SecretKeyType keyType)
      This method retrieves the SecretKey from Key Server.

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyFromKeyServer

        javax.crypto.SecretKey getKeyFromKeyServer(ServiceTicket serviceTicket,
                                         KerberosAuthenticationAPIImpl.SecretKeyType keyType)
        This method retrieves the SecretKey from Key Server. It requires the ServiceTicket for the Key Server
        Parameters:
        serviceTicket - ServiceTicket Kerberos Service Ticket to access the Key Server
        keyType - SecretKeyType Type of key to be fetched from Key Server
        Returns:
        SecretKey or null in case exception or error or if key is not available on the kerberos server
